  • Method Details

    • beforeProcessStart

      void beforeProcessStart(String markerName)
      Deprecated.
      Use beforeProcessStart(String, ObservabilityContext) instead.
      Called before the start of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function

    • beforeProcessStart

      default void beforeProcessStart(String markerName, ObservabilityContext context)
      Called before the start of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • afterProcessComplete

      void afterProcessComplete(String markerName, ElapsedTime elapsedTime)
      Deprecated.
      Use afterProcessComplete(String, ElapsedTime, ObservabilityContext) instead.
      Called after the successful completion of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      elapsedTime - The time that the process took to complete

    • afterProcessComplete

      default void afterProcessComplete(String markerName, ElapsedTime elapsedTime, ObservabilityContext context)
      Called after the successful completion of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      elapsedTime - The time that the process took to complete
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • onProcessFail

      void onProcessFail(String markerName, ElapsedTime elapsedTime)
      Deprecated.
      Use onProcessFail(String, ElapsedTime, ObservabilityContext) instead.
      Called after the failed completion of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      elapsedTime - The time that the process took to complete

    • onProcessFail

      default void onProcessFail(String markerName, ElapsedTime elapsedTime, ObservabilityContext context)
      Called after the failed completion of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      elapsedTime - The time that the process took to complete
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • onProcessError

      void onProcessError(String markerName, Throwable throwable)
      Deprecated.
      Use onProcessError(String, Throwable, ObservabilityContext) instead.
      Called after the error completion of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      throwable - The error that has been thrown

    • onProcessError

      default void onProcessError(String markerName, Throwable throwable, ObservabilityContext context)
      Called after the error completion of a function/block that is to be Observed
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      throwable - The error that has been thrown
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • recordSetValue

      default void recordSetValue(String markerName, String aspect, String value, ObservabilityContext context)
      Record a set value metric.
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      aspect - The name of the metric, which will be combined with the marker name
      value - The set value
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • recordCount

      default void recordCount(String markerName, String aspect, long delta, ObservabilityContext context)
      Record a count delta on the given operation (markerName) and aspect.
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      aspect - The name of the metric, which will be combined with the marker name
      delta - The change in count for this metric (usually 1)
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • recordDistributionValue

      default void recordDistributionValue(String markerName, String aspect, long value, ObservabilityContext context)
      Record a distribution value on the given operation (markerName) and aspect.
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      aspect - The name of the metric, which will be combined with the marker name
      value - The distribution value
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • recordServiceCheck

      default void recordServiceCheck(String markerName, String aspect, ServiceCheckStatus status, ObservabilityContext context)
      Record a status check on the given service (markerName) and aspect.
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this service
      aspect - The name of the check, which will be combined with the marker name
      status - The status of this service at this time
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • recordGaugeValue

      default void recordGaugeValue(String markerName, String aspect, long value, ObservabilityContext context)
      Record a gauge value on the given operation (markerName) and aspect. Unlike counters gauges can go down, good example of a gauge is a speedometer in a car
      Parameters:
      markerName - Name of the marker for this function
      aspect - The name of the metric, which will be combined with the marker name
      value - The gauge value to record
      context - ObservabilityContext

    • flush

      default void flush()
      Flush monitoring data. This might be useful to make sure all metrics were sent to the backend
